data: twentieth year of the reign of the Emperor Augustus | four years before the death of King Herod

My former name was Joseph the son of Simeon, and I was born in Sepphoris, the metropolis of Galilee, in the twentieth year of the reign of the Emperor Augustus, about four years before the death of King Herod.
Philochristus: Memoirs of a Disciple of the Lord
browsing: literature|browsing: religion/spirituality/paranormal|browsing: fiction|category: historical novels|category: religion/spirituality
